svg.title: Module - Node - Skill Hierarchy
svg.desc: Three-tier governance architecture showing how Modules contain Nodes that govern Skills. One fully expanded example (Rent Roll Analysis) with collapsed modules demonstrating the pattern.

g.text: Analytical Engine / Phase 5A: Rent Roll Validation
Methodology: Dual-scenario analysis, market-derived rents, loss-to-lease quantification
Sets methodology, quality gates, and professional standards
that ALL skills in the module must follow. One node per
CFA, CCIM). Skills cannot override node-level rules.
Each skill is a standalone analytical task with defined inputs,
outputs, and methodology. Skills can execute independently
or chain together within the module's execution graph.

svg.text: SYSTEM-WIDE RULES — Apply to ALL tiers
Every module follows the same three-tier pattern. Nodes enforce standards. Skills do the work. System rules bind everything.
